name: Varus
title: the Arrow of Retribution
lore: One of the ancient darkin, Varus was a deadly killer who loved to torment his foes, driving them almost to insanity before delivering the killing arrow. He was imprisoned at the end of the Great Darkin War, but escaped centuries later in the remade flesh of two Ionian huntersâ€”they had unwittingly released him, cursed to bear the bow containing his bound essence. Varus now seeks out those who trapped him, in order to enact his brutal vengeance, but the mortal souls within still resist him every step of the way.
blurb: One of the ancient darkin, Varus was a deadly killer who loved to torment his foes, driving them almost to insanity before delivering the killing arrow. He was imprisoned at the end of the Great Darkin War, but escaped centuries later in the remade...
allytips: An early point in Blighted Quiver helps harass enemy champions and get killing blows on minions.
During short range fights it's sometimes best to fire Piercing Arrow quickly, rather than charging it to full power.
Try to take advantage of Piercing Arrow's very long range to snipe at enemy champions before a fight or as they're trying to flee.
enemytips: If you are affected by Blight, Varus' abilities will deal extra damage to you.
When he gets a kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed and is much more dangerous.
You'll get bound in place if a tendril from Varus' ultimate, Chain of Corruption, reaches you. You can cause the tendril to die however by running far enough away from it.

riot_spell_q.name: Piercing Arrow
riot_spell_q.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ totaldamagemintooltip }} to {{ totaldamagemax }} physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks on at least one enemy champion.

riot_spell_w.name: Blighted Quiver
riot_spell_w.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ f2*100 }}% to {{ f1*100 }}% of the target's missing health (scales with Piercing Arrow charge).

Blighted Quiver is capped at {{ e5 }} damage against monsters.

riot_spell_e.name: Hail of Arrows
riot_spell_e.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

riot_spell_r.name: Chain of Corruption
riot_spell_r.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

riot_spell_i.name: Living Vengeance
riot_spell_i.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Living Vengeance
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Varus''' gains 40% {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 5 seconds upon an enemy champion {{tip|takedown}}, and 20% {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} '''bonus''' attack speed on non-champion kills.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Piercing Arrow
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Varus''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 4 seconds to gradually increase ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|range}} and damage over the next 2 seconds, during which he is {{tip|pacify|pacified}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: ''Piercing Arrow'' is canceled when the charge ends, refunding {{sti|mana|{{as|half of the mana cost}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Varus''' fires a piercing arrow dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies struck, which is increased by {{pp|11|type=Channel time|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|displayformula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}. The arrow's damage is reduced to {{pp|6|type=enemy hit|key=%|100 to 40;33|0 to 5|displayformula=100% - (15% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at a minimum of 33% damage.''}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description4: Detonating {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks on an enemy champion reduces ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling3:
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|10|46.7|83.3|120|156.7}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Minimum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|3.3|15.6|27.8|40|52.2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|36.3}}% AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|15|70|125|180|235}} {{as|(+ 165% AD)}}|Maximum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|5|23.3|41.7|60|78.3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|54.45}}% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.target_range: {{pp|11|type=channel time|925 to 1625|0 to 2|displayformula=925{{plus}}(70 per 0.2 seconds). ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* Despite being {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, ''Varus'' can still {{si|Flash}} (and cast all other [[summoner spells]] except {{si|Teleport}}) during ''Piercing Arrow's'' channel.
* The range of the spell will always be displayed, even as it increases.
* Using {{si|Recall}} while charging ''Piercing Arrow'' will also cancel the cast.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Blighted Quiver
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Varus'''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and apply '''Blight''' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: '''Varus'''' other abilities detonate '''Blight''' on enemies upon damaging them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} for each stack. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description3: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus'''' next {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} deals {{as|{{pp|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6 to 14|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=Piercing Arrow channel time|11|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|formula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6*1.5 to 14*1.5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.
wikia_skill_w1.description4: ''Blighted Quiver'' can be cast during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}. If the arrow is not fired within 5 seconds, ''Blighted Quiver'' is placed on a 1 second cooldown, or on full cooldown if the charge is canceled.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|on-hit}} damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities.
* ''Blighted Quiver's'' active damage is dealt after the damage of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Hail of Arrows
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' fires a hail of arrows that deals {{as|physical damage}} on impact to all enemies in the target area.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: The area is desecrated for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies standing in it and applying {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * Slows will linger for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Chain of Corruption
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' flings out a tendril of corruption that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for 2 seconds while inflicting them with full stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: On impact, the tendril seeks out nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds, after which they are also infected. Tendrils will continue to spread until there are no champions in range that have not already been affected.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: '''Chain of Corruption''' will attempt to spread even if the first target dies or becomes free of the snare.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption if they were not affected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range.
* Consuming the {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks applied by ''Chain of Corruption'' will deal bonus magic damage based on {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} rank. If {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} hasn't been ranked yet, the three {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing {{as|{{fd|1.25}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per stack.
